hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via Breakout from 3-Month Compression with Sector Rotation
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a NEUTRAL regime lasting >30 days with BTC trading in a <15% range, a breakout above the range high on weekly closing basis, accompanied by DeFi sector outperformance (DEFI index/BTC > 1.15) and positive funding rates resumption, predicts transition to BULL regime within 5 days with 68% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended compression represents accumulation. Breakout with sector rotation (from BTC to risk-on DeFi) indicates new capital allocation rather than short squeeze. Positive funding resumption confirms sustainable long positioning.
entry_conditions: Current regime = NEUTRAL for >30 consecutive days
Aggregate perpetual funding rates turn positive after ≥5 days neutral/negative

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BULL (confidence > 60%) OR 6% price appreciation from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC falls back into compression range (below range midpoint)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Signal fails if breakout occurs during declining total stablecoin supply (indicating net capital outflow) or when S&P 500 is in a downtrend (>1% below 50D SMA).
